sqlMap.insert: insert into cbp_interface_process_log (id_interface_process_log, business_no, sys_id, trx_type, trx_date, error_code, error_msg , data_info, created_by, created_date, updated_by, updated_date) values (sys_guid(), #businessNo#, #sysId#, #trxType#, sysdate, #errorCode#, #errorMsg#, #dataInfo#, 'sys', sysdate, 'sys', sysdate);
